name: Project: Beygoma
description:
DISCLAIMER: This build is an ALPHA release that only works for 2 player local play (2 controllers). Online functionality only works through third party software (such as Parsec).

Project: Beygoma is a proof of concept of an simplistic yet different style of fighting game. Players control ancient spinning tops called Beygomas in one-on-one combat to become the best.

Controls (Controller Heavily Recommended):

Xbox - 
- Movement - Left Thumbstick
- Basic Attack - A
- Heavy Attack - X
- Dodge - RB/RT
- Parry - LB/LT
- Bey Select - Left/Right D-Pad

Playstaion -
- Movement - Left Thumbstick
- Basic Attack - X
- Heavy Attack - □ 
- Dodge - R1/R2
- Parry - L1/L2
- Bey Select - Left/Right D-Pad
